wikipedia_page.main:
Ross Beattie (born 15 November 1977) is a Scotland international rugby union player for RC Nice in the Federale 1. The previous club he played for was the Newcastle Falcons in the Guinness Premiership.
Ross Beattie's position of choice is as a back-row forward.
